title: Players
creator_credit: John Halas, Kratky Film and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: An animated satire on aggression. Two characters, who look like two famous tennis players play a game of tennis which gradually develops into a battle. (Award: Special Jury Prize, Montreal World Film Festival, 1982)
creator_credit_for_label: John Halas, Kratky Film and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
